include(ExternalProject)

SET( MR_ROGERS_DEPENDENCIES )

include(gtest.cmake)
LIST(APPEND MR_ROGERS_DEPENDENCIES ${GTEST_PROJECT})
include(eigen.cmake)
LIST(APPEND MR_ROGERS_DEPENDENCIES ${EIGEN_PROJECT})
include(external_sort.cmake)
LIST(APPEND MR_ROGERS_DEPENDENCIES ${EXTERNAL_SORT_PROJECT})

SET(MR_ROGERS_SOURCE_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/external CACHE INTERNAL "" FORCE)

SET(MR_ROGERS_EXTERNAL_PROJECT_DIR ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/externals/mr_rogers_external_project CACHE INTERNAL "external project directory")
SET(MR_ROGERS_EXTERNAL_PROJECT mr_rogers_external_project CACHE INTERNAL "all mr_rogers external projects")
ExternalProject_Add(${MR_ROGERS_EXTERNAL_PROJECT}
    DEPENDS ${MR_ROGERS_DEPENDENCIES}
    DOWNLOAD_COMMAND ""
	SOURCE_DIR ${MR_ROGERS_SOURCE_DIR}
	BINARY_DIR ${MR_ROGERS_EXTERNAL_PROJECT_DIR}/bin
	INSTALL_COMMAND ""
    UPDATE_COMMAND ""
	CMAKE_CACHE_ARGS
        -DCMAKE_C_COMPILER:STRING=${CMAKE_C_COMPILER}
        -DCMAKE_CXX_COMPILER:STRING=${CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER}
)
